channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Mapa Politico España

item.title: CVE-2021-24609|2024-08-03T19:35:20.211Z -- unknown -- wp%20mapa%20politico%20espa%C3%B1a
item.description: The WP Mapa Politico Espana WordPress plugin before 3.7.0 does not sanitise or escape some of its settings before outputting them in attributes, allowing high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html is disallowed
